text: Copy, paste, and cut with keyboard shortcuts
about: Copy, paste, and cut with keyboard shortcuts in Microsoft Word

text: Ctrl+N: Create a new document,Ctrl+O: Open an existing document.
about: Commands to create new document and open existing documnet in Microsoft Word

text: Ctrl+Z: Undo an action, Ctrl+Y: Redo an action.
about: Commands to undo and redo an action in Microsoft Word
